nodes.name: confirmReceived

abort().details: Public function to abort the purchase and reclaim the etherPrivate (Seller only)The contract is locked Reverts if the caller is not the seller

confirmPurchase().details: Public function to confirm the purchase as a buyerPrivate (Buyer only)The ether will be locked until confirmReceived Reverts if the buyer value is lower than bundle value

confirmReceived().notice: Confirm that you (the buyer) received the item. This will release the locked ether.
